questions.quote: No one's ever written me a letter like this. Maybe I was wrong about her!
You know what? I think this Ruthie Cohen gave me the wrong change. Didn't I pay with a twenty? I'm sure I paid with a twenty.
Fine. Fine.  Excuse me.  Think I'm gonna forget about this? I haven't forgotten about this. I don't forget that easily!
Well obviously that was a mistake. You need to forget about Arnie. The important thing is you're moving on.
By the way, you know you're falling way behind on the 'I love you's.'
I could have given you some pointers. I know how to press those buttons buddy.
Holy cow it's a scorcher. Boy I bet you that guy can cover a lot of court.
Hey, you know what I think it is? I think it's that East River. I think it might be polluted.
Hey, why don't you take her to that place in Vermont I was telling you about? You know, that really charming place with the separate faucets for the hot and cold. She'll love it.
Different pipes go to different places! You're gonna mix 'em up!
